title: WTB N172 Bug Holliday Des Moines
author: ternst17

posts.post_title: WTB N172 Bug Holliday Des Moines
posts.post_content: I’m looking to buy an N172 Old Judge Bug Holliday Des Moines card if anyone has one available. I don’t have any of his yet, so open to any pose. In the process of selling off a few things, but wanted to see what was available.
Thanks to Joe G I was able to add a couple Bug Holliday cards to my collection. I’m planning to continue working on the entire run, so interested in other poses or variations.
It was a pleasure meeting up with you today Tyler.  Good luck with a Bug Holliday pose run and Des Moines OJs in general!  Some of the players and poses are extreme toughies.

Email Jay and see if he can help.

[url]oldjudge@gmail.com[/url]
